description:
Osanajimi no Tadashii Kai Kata:
Childhood friends Konomi and the twin brothers Kei and Yuu had a distorted relationship. Konomi likes both Kei`s long and cute tool and Yuu`s thick and strong tool. Kei and Yuu decides to compete to see which one is more suitable for her. What is the conclusion of Konomi who continues to be treated like their pet?
Doutei Otoko to Tora Mimi Onna:
The beautiful student council president, Riko, called for her classmate, Kaname, a virgin that have had an eye for her. When he went to the designated place and opened the door, there he finds Riko entwined with another student. What did she need Kaname for?

titles.title: Osananajimi no Tadashii Kai Kata / Doutei Otoko to Tora Mimi Onna
幼馴染みの正しい飼い方 / 童貞男と虎耳女
